The following bugs in omniORB 4.0.2 have been fixed. Update from CVS to get the fixes.

Summary: Race condition in connection cleanup (bug number 2)
Date: Mon Oct 20 17:03:00 BST 2003
Link: http://www.omniorb-support.com/pipermail/omniorb-list/2003-October/024372.html
Link: http://www.omniorb-support.com/pipermail/omniorb-list/2003-September/024205.html
Description: A race conditon meant that sometimes connections were not properly closed, leading to problems shutting down, and a resource leak.
Summary: Registry reading broken on Windows (bug number 1)
Date: Thu Aug 21 15:53:14 BST 2003
Reported by: Paul Keeley
Link: http://www.omniorb-support.com/pipermail/omniorb-list/2003-August/024096.html
Description: A fix to reading of the configuration file accidentally disabled reading from the registry.
